main event: An object was observed in the sky over Albuquerque, New Mexico on 28 March 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared as a white luminous ball about the size of a dime held at arm's length., The object was stationary and did not move during the observation., It was first observed in the north and moved slowly to the west before disappearing., The object left no trail or vapor trail and appeared self luminous., There was no sound associated with the object during the observation.
